name: directory-listing-plus-plus
description: directory listing app with extra features like audio player

scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.watch:client: cd client && npm run build:watch && cd ..

scripts.debug: npm run build:server && npm run server
